[{0}] shook their head.
"Are you... telling me to give you all of it?"
The Sinner nodded.
"You..."
"Fuu, haha. Fine, I've lost. You can have this."
[{0}] finally made a light smile as they claimed the cup.
failureDesc:
[{0}] stood before the gentleman's mountainous belly.
"Ah, I couldn't share this with you, even if you're a privileged guest."
Instead of demanding it, [{0}] just stares into the fairy.
"...Ahem."
Completely still, not moving a muscle.
"...Standing like that won't change my answer, you know?"
After vigorous laughter, the fairy gulped down all of the cup's content into his stomach.
"As much as I care about you, I couldn't give you everything I have, could I? Haha."
Defeated, [{0}] returned.

dataList.title: Looking for a Drone
dataList.eventDesc: A Sinner good at searching should be able to help.
dataList.behaveDesc: Who will be the most efficient at the job?
successDesc:
Several wounds were left on [{0}]'s hands while rummaging through the wreckage.
Fortunately, we were able to find a small ampule in it.
"After going through that trouble..."
The other Sinners sighed at the ultimately pointless haul.
...We had to leave the room with my promise that I'll turn the clock for them next time.
failureDesc:
The broken debris was sharper than expected.
"…!"
Several wounds were left on [{0}]'s hands while rummaging through the wreckage.
"Guess there's nothing."
Nothing useful could be found after several more minutes of searching.
"……."
I feel the resentful glares of the Sinners on my back.

dataList.title: Poking at the Egg
dataList.eventDesc:
Considering our experiences with receiving gifts from Abnormalities,
we might just be able to get something to help with exploring the dungeon here.
dataList.behaveDesc:
Who will be the most effective at the job?
A delicate hand will have an easier time.
successDesc:
"Whoa!"
[{0}] touched the egg. It started glowing.
Soon afterwards, it hardened and turned into a uniquely shaped gem.
"This looks worth taking."
[{0}] seemed rather tired, but there wasn't anything off about the body as far as we could see.
We left the place with the gem in our possession.
failureDesc:
"Whoa!"
[{0}] touched the egg. It started glowing.
However, the egg soon crumbled into dust.
"Ugh..."
A mysterious wound was left on [{0}]'s hand.
And the Sinner seemed tired as well.
...We left the room, consoling [{0}].

dataList.title: PickingRowAndColumn
dataList.eventDesc:
When you look closer, you can almost see something else in there.
A Sinner with keen eyes might be able to get something good.
dataList.behaveDesc: Who will take a look?
successDesc:
[{0}] looked at the cabinet.
The Sinner discovered a hidden drawer. The drawer contained a number of useful items.
Soon afterward, the area began to blur, and the cabinet disappeared.
failureDesc:
[{0}] looked at the cabinet.
Perhaps the Sinner spent too long pondering; the area began to blur, and the cabinet disappeared.

dataList.title: Try Talking
dataList.eventDesc: All the Sinners faced the window.
dataList.behaveDesc: Who will talk to the figures?
successDesc: Icriedwithoutachoice. Oh ▽ ! Iaminpain. Ientertainthethought: HowmustIcry. When [{0}] talked to the figures in the window, they writhed and disappeared. Then a fragment fell from the window. We took it and left the room.

Icriedwithoutachoice. Oh ▽ ! Iaminpain. Ientertainthethought: HowmustIcry. When [{0}] talked to the figures in the window, they writhed and disappeared. Then a fragment fell from the window. We took it and left the room.
failureDesc:
…………..
[{0}] tried talking, but there was no response.
Soon enough, the figures writhed and disappeared.
"What, did they want us to sing or something?"
We left the room with the Sinners complaining.

dataList.title: Stand in his way.
dataList.behaveDesc: Will you stop Dongrang?
successDesc:
[{0}] managed to block Dongrang's attack.

"Haah... You're being a nuisance."

Dongrang muttered as his weapon bounced off.
Beneath his bitter chuckle was a cold fury.
failureDesc:
[{0}] tried to stop Dongrang, but alas...

"Haha, what a futile thing you're doing."

Perhaps the attack was more powerful than anticipated. The Sinner was the one that got knocked away.

"Haah... You're being a nuisance."
"I'd much prefer if you served as seeds... for my accomplishment."

Beneath his mocking grin was a cold fury.

dataList.title: Stand in his way.
dataList.behaveDesc: Will you stop Dongrang again?
successDesc:
[{0}] drove their weapon into Dongrang while his focus was elsewhere.

"Kgh..."

It looks like the attack was successful.
The move Dongrang was preparing didn't come through.

"I see where you stand..."

"Then I'll just get rid of you all along with Yi Sang and his ideal."
failureDesc:
{0}] drove their weapon into Dongrang while his focus was elsewhere.

"Such incompetence."

However, what seemed to be the gap in his defense was merely his trap.
The Sinner was knocked away by his attack.

"Hah, I see where you stand..."

"You leave me with no choice. I'll get rid of you all along with Yi Sang and his ideal."

dataList.title: Stand in his way.
dataList.eventDesc:
"……."

Yi Sang walked ahead.

"I must insist... that I mark the end for Dongrang."

"...For that would be most ideal."
successDesc:
Yi Sang managed to stop Dongrang in his path.

"Yi Sang..."

"I plead you, end this now... Dongrang."

"Haha... How can I?"

"In the end, someone... has to... cry tears, isn't that right...?"

Dongrang pulled the weapon lodged into himself deeper inside.

"…!"

"Let's end it this way... Yi Sang..."

dataList.title: Fairy Longlegs
dataList.prevDesc: The sky seems to have been covered again. Why does it keep casting that shade?
dataList.eventDesc:
The giant plant that the fairy made grow was as thick as it was tall.

It did have its perks.

Like hiding behind a building's column, one Sinner managed to escape the fairy's view.

The Sinner then carefully struck at the stem.
dataList.behaveDesc: Who struck at the stem?
successDesc:
Striking at the stem, [{0}] climbed up the plant, hand over foot over hand.

The Sinner climbed so high, the others and the fairy appeared as tiny dots.

The plant seemed endlessly tall, but it had its end.

At last, [{0}] climbed onto the massive leaf at the top.

Then the Sinner carefully walked up to the edge...

And poked a hole in the leaf, causing the pool of water to fall on the fairy's head.

The fairy is making quite a fuss, looking surprised.
failureDesc:
Striking at the stem, [{0}] climbed up the plant, hand over foot over hand.

The Sinner climbed so high, the others and the fairy appeared as tiny dots.

The plant seemed endlessly tall, but it had its end.

At last, [{0}] climbed onto the massive leaf at the top.

But perhaps the Sinner failed to consider the amount of water that ponded on the leaf...

As soon as [{0}] stepped on the leaf, they slipped and fell right to the ground.

...It might be fortunate that the Sinner didn't die.
